April 17, 1968
Mr. Robert Swezey
545 Madison Avenue
New York, New York
Dear Bob;
Just a brief note to thank you and Ward Chamberlin
for the warm welcome, delicious lunch, and (I hope)
a productive meeting last Monday.
As you know, I am back in the office for just one
day, and off again this Thursday and Friday for
meetings in connection with the Ford Foundation
announcement regarding educational radio. However,
I will try to get some of the information which we
discussed into your hands early next week prior to
your board meeting on April 26.
In the meantime, please let me know if there is anyÂ¬
thing else which would be of help to you.
Best regards,
Sincerely,
Jerrold Sandler
